text: so while this worked .. I now have instead created recursive foreign keys .. so that I can just traverse properties on the entities "up" and "down"
in my use case I have base tables and translation tables
so base table references the translation table and the translation table now also references the base table
My mind is hurting from reading this, currently trying to build a diagram on a napkin
tell me about it .. I am doing some super wonky code to try and work around the lack of proper joins
